name: Pasta Carbonara
instructions: Cook the pasta, mix the egg with the cheese, fry the pancetta and combine everything.

name: Ensalada Cesar
instructions: Mix lettuce, grilled chicken, toasted bread and cheese. Add the sauce.

name: Tacos al Pastor
instructions: Marinate the pork with spices and achiote. Grill the pork and pineapple. Serve on tortillas with onion, cilantro, and sauce.

name: Valencian Paella
instructions: Sauté the chicken and rabbit. Add the vegetables and tomato. Incorporate the rice and saffron. Cook with broth until the rice is done.

name: Salmon Sushi
instructions: Cook the rice and mix it with vinegar, sugar, and salt. Spread the rice on the nori, add the salmon, and roll it up. Slice into pieces.

name: Beef Lasagna
instructions: Cook the beef with the tomato sauce. Layer lasagna sheets, beef, spinach, and cheeses. Bake until golden.

name: Tiramisu
instructions: Beat the egg yolks with sugar and mix with mascarpone. Dip the ladyfingers in coffee and layer with the cream. Dust with cocoa.

name: Classic Burger
instructions: Shape the beef into patties and grill them. Assemble the burger with the ingredients and serve with fries.

name: Shrimp Ceviche
instructions: Cook the shrimp and mix them with lime juice. Add onion, cilantro, tomato, and avocado. Serve cold.

name: Margherita Pizza
instructions: Spread the dough, add tomato sauce and cheese. Bake until the crust is crispy. Top with basil and a drizzle of olive oil.
